For Marine Engineering and Industrial 
Safety & Environmental Engineering ‘O’ 
level pass in Biology is required.  
At least ‘O’ level credit pass in English 
Language is required.  
  
CIVIL ENGINEERING  
TECHNOLOGY

FEDPO-BAU

FEDPO-MUB   
Five  (5)  SSC  credit 
 passes  in Mathematics, 
Physics and Chemistry and any two (2) 
subjects from:  
Biology/Agricultural Science   
Technical Drawing,  
Basic Electronics/Basic Electricity,  
Auto Mechanics,  
Metal Work,  
Woodwork  for  Civil  Engineering  
Technology,  
Further Mathematics  
English Language,  
Geography,  
Economics/Commerce.  
For Marine Engineering and Industrial 
Safety & Environmental Engineering a 
pass in Biology is required.  
At least ‘O’ level credit pass in English 
Language is required.  
Mathematics, 
 Physics and 
Chemistry.  
  
a) AUCHIPOL,  GIWAPOLY,  FEDPOILA 
 and  
FEDPOIDA require ‘O’ level credit in Chemistry.  
b) IMT-ENU requires four (4) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
one (1) sitting or five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
two (2) sittings and offers it as Civil Engineering.  
c) SARO-WIWA POLY requires ‘O’ level credit pass 
in English Language.  
d) MAPOLY requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at 
not more than two (2) sittings to include ‘O’ level 
credit passes in Chemistry and Physics and at 
least ‘O’ level pass in English Language.  
e) FEDPO-ADO accepts ‘O’ level credit pass in 
Geography or Economics.  
f) FEDPO-AIU accepts ‘O’ level credit passes from 
Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Basic 
Electronics/Electricity, Auto Mechanics, Metal 
Work and Wood Work.  
g) OZORO and YABATECH require ‘O’ level credit 
passes in English Language, Mathematics, 
Chemistry, Physics & any other subject from 
Biology/Agricultural Science/Technical Drawing.  
h) FEDPOFFA accepts at least ‘O’ level pass in 
Chemistry.  
i) IBD-POLY same as in Electrical/Electronics.  
j) RAMATPOLY  same  as  in 
 Architectural  
Technology
